p: The IC 50, GI 50, TGI and LC 50 parameters were calculated using MS Office Excel ® free add-in ED50 plus v1.0 software ( www.sciencegateway.org/protocols/cellbio/drug/data/, accessed on 1 April 2021). SPSS software version 20 was used for statistical data analysis. The Shapiro–Wilk test was used to test the normality of data distribution. Depending on the results normality test, for the comparison of groups, one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) or its non-parametric equivalent Kruskal–Wallis test was used.
